item.description:
Holy Communion is the one sacrament that can be partaken of daily. Thus, daily millions worldwide line up to receive it. But how many of those participating truly come into union with the Holy offering that is this sacrament? How many truly understand the mystery of Jesus' body and blood and allow themselves to be affected by this most beautiful gift?  Whether you have never received communion or are a daily partaker, this seminar is for you. Come and understand for yourself why this most perfect gift given to us by the Master Jesus is the way to perfection for your soul. 

$25 - Bring a friend for free
item.name: Holy Communion with Father Peter
